<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script></div></div></div></div></div><div id="glb-corpo"><!-- PUBLIEDITORIAL --><!-- possui template smart --><div class='row bloco-wide'><div class="small-12 medium-12 large-12 columns"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_super"><div id="banner_super" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="row ge-destaques"><div class="gui-carousel-component-container" id="gui-carousel-highlight"><!-- PASSO 1 --><div class="gui-item-carousel"><div class="small-6 medium-6 large-6 columns gui-carousel-component-left-column"><div class="gui-headline destaque destaque-tracking destaque-box-destaque-principal-fotao-fotinha tipo-fotao glb-hl-style-fotao-base-esquerdo"><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/games/noticia/2017/03/felipe-yoda-sai-da-reserva-e-vive-tarde-iluminada-na-vitoria-contra-pain.html"

b=this.nodes;a.tmpl(null,null,null,this).insertBefore(b[0]);a(b).remove()}})(jQuery);

var SVCPesquisaConfig = {};
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_pesquisa = "1181961";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_embed = "1f2eac6aa132";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app = "pesquisa.globosat.globo.com";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirJquery = false;
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirTrackEvents = 'UA-16233545-1';

var SVCPesquisaDone = false;

var SVCPesquisaLoad = document.createElement("script");
    SVCPesquisaLoad.type = "text/javascript";
    SVCPesquisaLoad.async = true;

SVCPesquisaLoad.onreadystatechange = function() {

var SVCPesquisaState;

if(!SVCPesquisaDone){

    SVCPesquisaState = SVCPesquisaLoad.readyState;

    if(SVCPesquisaState === "complete") {
            SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
        }
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.onload = function(){
    if(!SVCPesquisaDone){
        SVCPesquisaDone = true;
        SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.src = 'http://' + SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app + '/app.min.js';

var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(SVCPesquisaLoad, s);

</script><script type="text/javascript" src="http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/CACHE/js/2b418a316a7b.js"></script><script src="http://s.videos.globo.com/p2/j/api.min.js"></script><!-- JS de Videos --><script src="http://s.glbimg.com/pc/ca/cadun.js" defer></script><script src="http://s.glbimg.com/bu/j/jquery.buscaPadrao-v2.js" defer></script><script>
            glb.barra = {
                exibeAssineJa: true,
                exibeCentral: true,
                iframe: false
            };
            (function() {
                var s = document.createElement("script"); s.type = "text/javascript"; s.async = true;
                s.src = "http://s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";
                var ss = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s, ss);
            })();
        </script></body>

Bahia
</h1>

<script pagespeed_orig_type="text/javascript" type="text/psajs" orig_index="22">r7ad.printGAds([970,250],'masthead').success(function(){'use strict';document.getElementById('masthead').style.display='block';$(document).ready(function(){document.getElementById('masthead-close').style.display='block';var hideCallback=function(){document.getElementById('masthead').style.display='none';};var onMastheadClose=function(e){e.preventDefault();$('#masthead').animate({height:0,opacity:0.4},500,hideCallback);};if($('.box.proximos_programas').length>0){$('.box.proximos_programas').addClass('masthead-true');}

</div>
</div>
<div class="column r7cl2 ">

<h3 class="headline">Fotos</h3>

<div class="r7item-highlight">
<a class="r7item-image image" href="http://noticias.r7.com/bahia/fotos/tres-mulheres-sao-presas-apos-furtar-varios-produtos-de-supermercado-e-alegam-desemprego-24032017?foto=1#!/foto/1">
<img src="https://img.r7.com/images/2017/03/23/3abnuhow4b_dkyp17dhb_file?dimensions=300x225" title="Três mulheres foram
presas suspeitas de furtar produtos de um supermercado no bairro da Pituba, em
Salvador. Segundo a polícia, Fabiana Santos de Azevedo, 35 anos, Camila de Jesus,
24, e Daniele dos Santos Amorim, 26, foram detidas com vários produtos furtados
avaliados em cerca de R$ 1000Experimente grátis toda a programação da Record no R7 Play - Foto: Reprodução/ Record TV Itapoan"/>
</a>
<p class="r7lead">
<a href="http://noticias.r7.com/bahia/fotos/tres-mulheres-sao-presas-apos-furtar-varios-produtos-de-supermercado-e-alegam-desemprego-24032017#!/foto/1" class="headline" alt="">Três mulheres são presas após furtar vários produtos de supermercado e alegam desemprego
</a>
</p>

primeira vez que cometerem o furto, mas o policial disse que elas já foram
flagradas várias vezes pelas câmeras de segurança do estabelecimento comercial" title="Moradoras do

<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div     (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);

    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_pesquisa = "1181961";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_embed = "1f2eac6aa132";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app = "pesquisa.globosat.globo.com";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirJquery = false;
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirTrackEvents = 'UA-16233545-1';

var SVCPesquisaDone = false;

var SVCPesquisaLoad = document.createElement("script");
    SVCPesquisaLoad.type = "text/javascript";
    SVCPesquisaLoad.async = true;

SVCPesquisaLoad.onreadystatechange = function() {

var SVCPesquisaState;

if(!SVCPesquisaDone){

    SVCPesquisaState = SVCPesquisaLoad.readyState;

    if(SVCPesquisaState === "complete") {
            SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
        }
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.onload = function(){
    if(!SVCPesquisaDone){
        SVCPesquisaDone = true;
        SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.src = 'http://' + SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app + '/app.min.js';

var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(SVCPesquisaLoad, s);
</script><script type="text/javascript" src="http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/CACHE/js/2528a5f4d28b.js"></script><script src="http://s.videos.globo.com/p2/j/api.min.js"></script><!-- JS de Videos --><script src="http://s.glbimg.com/pc/ca/cadun.js" defer></script><script src="http://s.glbimg.com/bu/j/jquery.buscaPadrao-v2.js" defer></script><script>

                exibeAssineJa: true,
